application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Crown Reductions x2 Fell x1 As Per Map:G1 - Cherry x2 (Class 2) -Front Court yard.Crown reduce to previous points, crown lift to 3 metres.G1 - Front Court Yard - 2x Cherry is located as shown on the map provided.The works are part of a regular maintenance program to retain the trees at a suitable size for their location.The trees are of a large spreading nature straddling gardens and encroaching onto the property.As Per MapT2 - Cherry (Class 2) - Middel Court YardCrown reduce to previous points, crown lift to 3 metres.T2 Cherry is located as shown on the map provided.The works are part of a regular maintenance program to retain the trees at a suitable size for their location.The trees are of a large spreading nature straddling gardens and encroaching onto the property.As Per MapT3 - Dead Cherry (Class 2) - Rear Cornor Court YardFell as close to ground level as possible.  Works to be carried out with the use of a MEWP.T3 Dead cherry is located as shown on the map provided.The tree poses a serious H&S issue.
site_name: Guinness Trust Buildings, Flat 1 A Block
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
